Description: Do not consume at more than 50% of rated power
Do not consume at more than 75% of rated power and source reactive power if capable
Increase power consumption(Subjects to constraints from other active DRMs)
Do not generate at more than 50% of rated power
Do not generate at more than 50% of rated power and sink reactive power if capable
Increase power generation(Subjects to constraints from other active DRMs)
